nodes.text: Anti-Vehicle Skiff were Bantha class skiffs that were outfitted by the Rebel Alliance with weapons that could penetrate heavily armored Imperial vehicles. The skiffs were lightly armored and able to move quickly.
Anti-Vehicle Skiffs made their first appearance in the 2014 video game Star Wars: Commander. They could be unlocked with a Level 6 factory if the player is aligned with the Rebellion.
